r.d: Modyllic, PHP SQL Parser and schema management tool
r.n: * Fully automate the release process * Move the tokenizer unit test into the unit tests directory * Fix formatting of routine_args_type * Fix formatting of proc_return_type and routine_args_type docs * Give modyllic a single commandline interface * Comments in tables can now attach to columns and the table * Make tokens stringify to their debug representation and take advantage * Fix normalization for dates and years the way we did for nums * Fix #172 Non-token numification always set the value to 0 * Fix bug where data updates would get lost if a tables static status did not change * Add coverage tools, a bunch of new unit tests, organize tests better.
